Module com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.client
Package com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.client

Class ClientSocketBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.github.jh3nd3rs0n.jargyle.client.ClientSocketBuilder
public final class ClientSocketBuilder extends Object
A builder for the client socket.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Socket
    newBoundConnectedClientSocket()
    Returns a new bound and connected client socket based on the properties socksClient.clientBindHost, socksClient.clientBindHostAddressTypes, socksClient.clientBindPortRanges, and socksClient.clientNetInterface.
    Socket
    newBoundConnectedClientSocket(InetAddress localAddr, int localPort)
    Returns a new connected client socket bound to the provided local InetAddress and the provided local port.
    Socket
    newClientSocket()
    Returns a new unbound and unconnected client socket.
    ConfiguringClientSocketBuilder
    proceedToConfigure(Socket clientSocket)
    Proceeds to configure the provided client socket by deferring to a returning new ConfiguringClientSocketBuilder to handle configuring the provided client socket.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • newBoundConnectedClientSocket

      public Socket newBoundConnectedClientSocket() throws IOException
      Returns a new bound and connected client socket based on the properties socksClient.clientBindHost, socksClient.clientBindHostAddressTypes, socksClient.clientBindPortRanges, and socksClient.clientNetInterface. If the property socksClient.ssl.enabled is set to true, a new bound and connected client SSLSocket is returned.
      Returns:
      a new bound and connected client socket based on the properties socksClient.clientBindHost, socksClient.clientBindHostAddressTypes, socksClient.clientBindPortRanges, and socksClient.clientNetInterface
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs in creating the client socket

    • newBoundConnectedClientSocket

      public Socket newBoundConnectedClientSocket(InetAddress localAddr, int localPort) throws IOException
      Returns a new connected client socket bound to the provided local InetAddress and the provided local port. If the property socksClient.ssl.enabled is set to true, a new bound and connected client SSLSocket is returned.
      Parameters:
      localAddr - the provided local InetAddress
      localPort - the provided local port
      Returns:
      a new connected client socket bound to the provided local InetAddress and the provided local port
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs in creating the client socket

    • newClientSocket

      public Socket newClientSocket()
      Returns a new unbound and unconnected client socket.
      Returns:
      a new unbound and unconnected client socket

    • proceedToConfigure

      public ConfiguringClientSocketBuilder proceedToConfigure(Socket clientSocket)
      Proceeds to configure the provided client socket by deferring to a returning new ConfiguringClientSocketBuilder to handle configuring the provided client socket.
      Parameters:
      clientSocket - the provided client socket
      Returns:
      a new ConfiguringClientSocketBuilder to handle configuring the provided client socket
